metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12659 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.6.7. xdp_umem_reg innet/xdp/xdp_umem.c has an out-of-bounds write (by a user with theCAP_NET_ADMIN capability) because of a lack of headroom validation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.2.0-16.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
